description: Endometrioid adenocarcinoma of the endometrium, FIGO grade I, with approximately 60% myometrial invasion, no lymphovascular invasion, and pathologic stage pT1c/pN0.
patient_notes: The report shows a low-grade endometrial cancer that invaded about half of the uterine muscle but did not spread to lymph nodes or other organs. Your uterus, ovaries, and fallopian tubes were removed, and the lymph nodes were negative. Based on these findings, you may not need further treatment beyond regular monitoring. We will discuss any additional options according to guidelines to lower the risk of recurrence.

verification.assessment: Staging and subtype identification are accurate; recommended treatment should reflect guideline-based observation for Stage IB grade I endometrioid adenocarcinoma without LVSI.

recommended_treatment.issues: NCCN guidelines recommend observation for Stage IB, grade 1 endometrioid carcinoma without LVSI; 'Not specified' does not align with this.

change_explanations.recommended_treatment: Changed from 'Not specified' to 'Observation'. Reason: NCCN guidelines recommend observation for Stage IB, grade 1 endometrioid carcinoma without LVSI; 'Not specified' does not align with this.
